111211111111111111111111111111111.content: mom knocks at your door can i come in sweaty sure you say as you turn off your brand new 64" LCD TV your mom says i see you like your new TV yeah i really love it we thought you would we figured that no one should go through what you went through i can't imagine not knowing what i will look like in the morning so your dad and i thought you should have it now i hear you had an interesting day well i got some new friends Heather and i just clicked and her boyfriend is cute to then i think Ren is quite taken by his brother who is just as cute as big bro then mom says how abut Steven you say that's what scars me as soon as i saw him again i felt kind of strange like i wanted to love him but i couldn't understand why i felt that way .oh sweaty that's natural well when you were a boy you were attracted to girls mom says yea but this is Steven what i wanna know is when did he get so cute and why did i not notice you say well sweaty it's all hormones remember Cindy Colline you wanted her for your girlfriend mom says yea but she turned me down you say and mom says why then you say because she wanted Steve not me then a light bulb turns on in your head that Steve was all ways cute just your male hormones wouldn't show you that then you say she even tried to make it so Steve and i were no longer friends but Steve told her bro's before hoe's then we did a high five and was done with her as i mean but no wonder now that I'm a girl i love him now that we talked about Steve i can show you these things then mom pulls out a yellow plastic bag full of famine hygiene and expanded each item now you realize the problem with a mom that's a retired RN .
111211111111111111111111111111111.title: the talk

1112111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(OK if you want to see the rest of the sex talk see a new school a new identity chapter 20 of the chemicals and in your mind think of it as Beth telling ray)
your wake up supper early to go see doc Blake before her shift ends so your sister Ronnie lens you an nice dress and all the stuff to go with it and you and your mom and sisters take you to the hospital so that Dr Blake wile you are in the waiting room you see Heather and Catlin you say why are you hear this early .then Heather says I'm hear to see Dr Hammond you me and Ren are hear to see Dr Blake for our physical be for things get to busy and we forget than Catlin says what about you Ronnie oh i had mine in New York Ronnie says oh Catlin says then as a reprieve you hear Ren and Ray the doctor will see you now then you say well it's Been good seeing you will meet soon you say with a smile then you go and get a cat scan and as you come out you see Heather coming out of the one next to you OK you say then you meet in the x-ray room the 2 of you start to giggle (off course what you and Heather don't know is the 2 of you are having the same tests done ) then you see Catlin in the waiting room then mom says we need to wait for heather then you realize that meeting Catlin and Heather was more than it just happened .
1112111111111111111111111111111111.title: the next morning

11121111111111111111111111111111111.content:
you find that you love shopping for clothes and shoes especially all of you get breakfast at the food Cort and 3hrs later you have 15 new set of clothes and 10 different swim suits and 25 pairs of shoes you find that it was so much fun then you fond out that Heather and Catlin forgot there swim suits so your a good friend and get them a new one and you also get a new swim suits for your sisters as well .
then you go home and see that Evey things in order for the fest able .then you spend the rest of the after noon at the lake with all your new friends you notice that Mel kept her t-shirt on as if to cover something but you all have fun til it's time to get ready for tonight .the boys leave 1hr before you need to get ready so you and all your new girlfriends and sisters have that time far all girl swim .
11121111111111111111111111111111111.title: to the mall

111211111111111111111111111111111111.content: you get home and find that Dillon is home for the 4th of July weekend and all your ants,uncles and cousins have come to they are staying in the cabins at the lake so all the Vitroy baton twirlers and cheer leading squad are all there then Nissen says good Dill. you up for running back yea I'll play who do we have for deference Nis. then Nissen say we got Rych the kitch Allen and rob Andrews and bob hill we also have John Mikels and Mike Jonson then you let them know your there both say hi sis witch one are you I'm Ray you say now i hope you don't mind but i have a date to get ready for so can you please get out of my way you say OK does mom know about this date says Nis and who's the boy says Dill you say annoyed yes and Steven then you notice them give Ren the same hard time you know they mean well and Nis almost has a teen daughter himself so he needs the practice so you get ready then you see your dad and brothers giving Steven and Bill the riot act then you finely hear your dad say you treat my daughters with respect and you will have no problems with me even if you break up .oh and anther thing seance nether one of you are rockets yet this means i can depend on both of you for teem Vitroy . yes you can both young men say then your dad says good then have them home by 10:00 other than that have fun.
111211111111111111111111111111111111.title: alls fair at the fair

1112111111111111111111111111111111111.content: as the 2 of you go you find that being a girl rocks and Steve treats you different from when you were 2 boys playing in your back yard he is softer some how this is a side of him that if you were still a boy you would never see the side of true love his mom always said you were his soul mate now you are a very pretty 100% girl and this boy that will grow into a man you know is yours til death til you part you jest know in your heart you were meant to be . all through your life you were your sisters proctor but now you know you cant do that any more as you look you see that they can kick your ass and you don't stand a chance so you hold Steve close and hope that Ronnie can find someone to protect her it looks like Ren fond bill . you think to your self and you put your head on Steve's shoulders and you have a good time and Steve takes good care of you through the date and your home by 10:00 pm and you are so in love with him.
1112111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ray's first date

11121111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
you wake up to Ren playing REO speed wagons i can't fight this feeling any more you grab your pillow and hug it and you think to yourself i totally know how she feels .
then you get up you get ready for breakfast and cheer leading practice the phone rings Ray it's for you thanks mom Steve how are you then Steve says missing you.
you say i miss you to .did you tell Billy that the foot ball team is a joke team .Steve says he'll find out you say are you ready to get kicked over the field ghoul again and go the wrong way.
stave says that's what i love about that team the fun we have and the cheers you give are just as funny as the foot ball team .then you say remember when you first joined how i took you under my wing and tout you the ins and outs of the jokes so you can perform them to .Steve says i remember then you say Ren and I are counting on you to do the same for Billy and teach him my old rue teen now that i can't do it.i will says Steve but it won't be the same without you out there with me then you say I'll still will be out there with you just I'll be cheer leading in stead of playing that's all well I'll see you at practice this morning Love you see you soon then you hang up and go eat your breakfast then go to practice you learn a lot of new joke cheers some you remember them doing wile you were playing you see your dad gave Steve your old number which was 12 but the joke it was on your jersey like this !? get it OK after practice all your new friends shows up when they get there you are gently rubbing Steve's shoulder that he hurt when he hit the side of the ghoul post instead of going over then mom sends all your friends to the lake then teaches you a healing spell you use it on Steve and he feels a lot better then you and Steve join every one at the lake then when the fair opens you go to the fair .
11121111111111111111111111111111111111.title: the morning after

111211111111111111111111111111111111111.content: the rest of the days goes the same the 4th starts at Buzz Aldrin high with the foot ball game you and your family make the hole town laugh so hard they split a gut from the time dad and his brothers and one of his brother in laws walked out dressed as clowns and the teem was introduced and they all thought that Jason was the cutest little thing and his number !/? the entire game was as silly as you can get think Harlem globe trotters just foot ball the Rockets won well Steve was told to drop the ball when he Jason kicked him over the ghoul post with magic from mom of course .then the party continues the fair is in full swing then just for fun Ann head of the Boosters challenges mom and the Vitroys in a baton twirling cheer leading contest after you and the teem kicks there but Ann asks if any of them are going to Buzz this year you and both of your sisters say we are then Ann says then i hope to see all 3 of you at cheer leading camp and to Mr and Mrs Vitroy i hope you will consider signing on as assistants then the day goes along well then jest before the fire works you Dad and Steve do a great show with the fire sticks then the fire works and all over.
111211111111111111111111111111111111111.title: the 4th of july bash

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: you wake up to find that it's all over it's all being taken down and you dad asks if your want to go to the pool store to get 2 water slides 1 for each side of the deep end dock you say yes then mom says that tomorrow your next lesson as a girl and all 3 of you as a witch starts we need to talk about the doe's and don't s of a good witch and Ray for your lesson in womanhood all 3 of you are haven a slumber party and Ray I expect you to get dressed and undressed with them in the room doing the same you all have the same parts so it should be no big deal when school starts you will have to change in the girls locker room so I want you to get used to changing with other girls there it for your own good .
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: july 5th

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: so you go to the pool store and pick out 1 strait slide and 1 twist slide your dad thought of a diving Bord but than thought it mite be to dangerous so stuck with just the 2 slides then you went home as the carnival was clearing out and so your family spent the rest of the day putting together the 2 slides and testing them out because your first slumber party starts at 1:00pm tomorrow all girls then the lights were in stalled for night time swimming mom got permission from all the parents and Becky said that her mom would like to help and dad said he'll go spend time with Nilson son sense Jean and the girls will be hear (Ralf couldn't Love that little boy any more if he tried) and this gave him an excuse to be with Nilson when he got home from work.
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: july 5th part 2

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: the rest of the day is fun for you and your sisters then you have a cook out at the lake you enjoy the night swim then you go home around 10:00pm and go to bed .you wake up at 8:00am to a big breakfast then your first witch lesson mom says to start i want to go over one of the worst curses a witch can do to a man that would be the curse of womanhood or more commonly none as witches revenge it a when it's complete it's a fine white powder that mixes in to any drink it is odorless tasteless so it can't be detected and whiten hours it changes a man to a woman as a side effect it cures caner the part that is bad is that it passes down to the first born male child that don't deserve it .it is so dangerous that if in the wrong hands it could wipe out the male population so if you ever think of use in it don't unless you were raped and that bastard is going to git away with it then and just then you ask the head witch permission like i did with Steven's father .then come to me and i will make it for you just 4 witches knows how to make it to limit the chances of it fallen in to non witch hands .the rest of the lesson goes well you learn a heeling spell and how to get rid of unwanted scars then the door bell rings it Heather and Catlin there mom brought them on her lunch break Pat is at a friends house and then Jean and Debby and Sally come as well then Becky Mel and Nancy (Becky's mom) came over as well so the party starts.
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: july 6th

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: you all change into swim suits then head out to the lake you have fun all day then a cook out then well into the night then around 10:00pm then we all go to the house and change for bed but instead all the other girls wants to play girlish games the ones you never played like truth or dare and other games as such you try to fake it because your sisters knew how to play so they all thought you knew as well luckily mom knew this would happen so she cast a mind link spell between you and Ren so she could tell you the rules with out given away this is your first slumber party you come to relies this is nothing like the sleepovers you use to have with Steve with the mere thought of him you blush then you find yourself at the center of attention so you think Ren do girls pillow fight then you hear in your head yes as both you and Ren grabs a soft pillow and starts one it's not long before all of you are pillow fighting then Heather accidentally hits you to hard as the zipper comes a cross your face blood starts to drop from the cut you hit the floor and pain starts going though your head and you find out how much a girl you have become when you start crying the Ronnie screams stop Ray is hurt then Heather knowing she was the last to hit you drops her pillow and goes over to you and sees what she did and starts apologizing to you for hitting you so hard in fact as you come to think of it Steve use to hit you that hard or maybe you were just looking for an excuse to think of Steve after all Heather can't be that strong or possibly know how a boy swings a pillow after all she is and always was a girl. then mom comes in and Heather enplanes the whole thing and says she is so sorry to hurt you she never meant to you forgiver her then mom says next time please don't be so ruff with my daughters please.then you all settle down and go to sleep .
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: slumber party

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: But you can't sleep very well 1 your cheek still hurts and 2 you recognize the swing that Heather hit you with it's the same swing you would have done if you weren't mind linked to Ren just be fore you started she said girls swing under hand not over hand we don't want to hurt each other so you went the way she said now you know that you can't take as much pain as you use to .
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Sleepless Night

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
you all get up and have breakfast then you all go swimming then around 5:00pm they all went home .you and your sisters had a magic lesson and then dinner and around 10:00pm bed.
the next day you go to what will be your new school Buzz Aldrin high to sign you and your sisters up and sigh them self's up as volunteers to help the cheer leading squad and get you to the cheer leading camp this year . then you all went home and 3 more magic lessons later you have dinner then go to bed the rest of the time is spent doing magic lessons, swimming and spending time with all your friends . now your exited because when you wake up you will be getting ready for cheer leading camp.


















e
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Time to get Bissey

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Finley you get up and get going your parents are ready to take all of you to camp as you get ready Jean says to knock the socks off the competition we will be there for the final cheer to cheer you on . So you all go to camp and you thought that the Vitroys was tough the Boosters was very challenging but with a lot of practice you and your sisters got the routine down plus you share a cabin with Heather and Catlin the whole 2 weeks went fast the competition was hard but the Booster made it to the final cheer for the first time in 5 years .
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Cheer Leading Camp at Last

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: As the boosters are introduced you get nerves but you see Jason jumping all over the place he trips on Kelly Sauders and then goes to his mom siting next to her and says witch one is aunt wryan. i mean aunt Ray Jean is shore that Kelly over herd that and tries to cover it up but a look on Kelley's face tells her that the cat is out of the bag on the bright side the Booster's won the compaction. the school is so prod of them and the big button go on display all cheer and then cheer leading camp ends and they all go home.
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: It's the cheer off's

1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: The next day Jean brings Jason over who is crying i didn't mean to then Beth say's what didn't you mean to do then jason says i (sob) think (sob) i (sob) got confused (sob)and i (sob)asked mom were (sob)aunt wryan is (sob)then i (sob) said i mean (sob) aunt Ray (sob sob sob)then Jean says i think Kelly over heard him. shortly after the phone rings it's Kelly she says that we need to talk. I'm having a small gathering to night and i would like your hole family to join us .Beth says i think that would be a good idea .then Kelly says do the Blakes know about Ray? the Beth says yes.then Kelly says good then i will invite them as well.
1112111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Time to talk

info.brief_description: boy turns in to a girl by magic
info.description:
a new family moves to just out side of the same small town as the sauders family .a family with a secret of there own .
meet the vitroys.
Bethany mom 63 the which looks like she could be in her thirty's.
Ralf dad retired 67 he looks like he is in his forty's
Dillen 37 first son born still looking for a wife Job a Lawyer
Nissan the next son has wife and 3 kids and works as an accountant
and now the triplets 13 going on 14 8th grade to start but 9th when they go to Florida
Ronda (Ronnie is her nickname)
Rena (Ren for short)
Ryan (you) will slowly change into Raychel (Ray for short) before your 14th birthday.
and Nilson's family
Jean wife 33 beautician Need i say more
Debby 12 7th grade to start 8th when they go to Florida
Sally 6 1st to start and 2end when they move to Florida
Jason 3 Grandma Bethanne's when they start and Grandma Bethanne's when they go to Florida
and now for the Blake family.
Nancy and Donald were Bethany best friends they had a daughter named Alison .
then Alison is a medical doctor.
Steve 14 Doc Alison's son through rape
and Ryan's best friend all his life moved to this town last year
and now the story please add this is my first story so please feel free to ad

i would like to thank the over 2000 viewers and please rate and add to any of the something else spots that would encourage me to add to continue .
info.pretty_title: A New School A New Identy 1&1\2
